Metadata.title: Backseat 90 - Listen to 90s Underground Rap
Metadata.description: Sit back and relax with 90's underground rap songs

HomePage.setting-description: Customize your settings and take a look at another options
HomePage.color-theme-description: Change the color theme of the app between dark, light and system mode
HomePage.language-description: Change the language of the app for your convenience and familiarity
HomePage.nickname-description: Enter your name to share your liked songs with other users (it is not necessary)
HomePage.nickname-length: Nickname should be less than 20 characters long
HomePage.change-password-description: Change your current password if you do not like your previous one
HomePage.change-password-success: You have changed your password successfully!
HomePage.change-your-password-description: Make changes to your current password here. Click save when you are done.
HomePage.liked-tracks-description: Here are all tracks that you liked
HomePage.no-tracks: You do not have liked songs yet
HomePage.delete-track-description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this track from your favorites
HomePage.not-empty-field: This field should not be empty
HomePage.six-characters: Password must be at least 6 characters
HomePage.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
HomePage.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
HomePage.digit: Password must contain at least one digit
HomePage.like-description: This track is added to favorites
HomePage.dislike-description: This track is removed from favorites
HomePage.cant-connect: Unable to connect to the radio
HomePage.radio-problem: Please reload the page or try again later...
HomePage.cant-send-empty-message: I am so sorry, but you can't send empty message
HomePage.tell-us-message: Tell us about bug you have found or something else
HomePage.authorize-to-get: Authorize to get access to this feature

Register.six-characters: Password must be at least 6 characters
Register.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
Register.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
Register.digit: Password must contain at least one digit
Register.not-empty: This field should not be empty

errors.network-error: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection or try again later.
errors.image-error: Can't load background from the server
errors.same-name: Your new name is the same as current one
errors.same-password: Your new password is the same as current one
errors.song-not-liked: This song is not liked, something went wrong
errors.failed-station-connection: Failed to connect to the station
errors.bug-report-limit-reached: Limit reached, please wait until your previous bug reports will be resolved
